jd_information.description: Exe- /Sr. Travel sales consultant / Travel Sales Consultant/Senior Travel Sales Consultant 9643467005 Call - Sanjay-9643467005 Gunjan- 9582676762 Priyanka- 8585951900JOB DESCRIPTIONHandling Customer service & Sales Calls from US Customers• Follow ups with customers and clients for existing reservations.• Sell / cross sell travel related services (Flights, Hotel, Car, Travel Insurance , holiday Packages etc)• Meeting monthly performance metricsELIGIBILITY CRITERIA• Excellent Communication and interpersonal skills.• 1 year + experience in international Travel Process.• 1year GDS experience (Amadeus or Sabare)• Flexible to work in any shifts (24X7).• Should be a team playerAGE 22 TO 32 YEARSSALARY : 22 K - 40 K + incentivesAdd-On• Both sides cabs• Good salary Package.• 5 Days workingUS -shifts
